Class QueryParameter<T>

Namespace
Innova.Data.Entity
Assembly
Innova.Data.dll

Represents a query parameter used for filtering and sorting data.

public class QueryParameter<T> : IQueryParameter, ICloneable where T : class

The type of the entity.
